name: Bleeding Canvas
summary:
Your college crush, Mikey, seems to be the perfect boy for you: He’s artsy, yet extroverted; sometimes a bit stupid and socially inept. But that’s why you love him. You didn’t think you had a chance with him, as you only ever talked to him in passing conversations, but when you try to follow him home you discover something about him that definitely proves his undying love for you…

There are four endings. Two bad endings, a good ending, and a not-so-secret secret ending.
